name: AIA_FormatTokens
sail_code:
"~" & a!match(
  value: local!value: if(
    ri!value <= 0,
    0,
    round(
      ri!value,
      -rounddown(log(ri!value, 10), 0)
    )
  ),
  whenTrue: fv!value > 950000000,
  then: fv!value / 1000000000 & "B",
  whenTrue: fv!value > 950000,
  then: fv!value / 1000000 & "M",
  whenTrue: fv!value > 950,
  then: fv!value / 1000 & "K",
  default: fv!value
)
